org.sxb.convert.support

クラス GenericConversionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.convert.support.GenericConversionService
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    ConversionService, ConverterRegistry, ConfigurableConversionService
    直系の既知のサブクラス:
    DefaultConversionService

    public class GenericConversionService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurableConversionService
    Base ConversionService implementation suitable for use in most environments. Indirectly implements ConverterRegistry as registration API through the ConfigurableConversionService interface.
    導入されたバージョン:
    3.0
    作成者:
    Keith Donald, Juergen Hoeller, Chris Beams, Phillip Webb, David Haraburda

    • メソッドの詳細

      • addConverter

        public void addConverter(Converter<?,?> converter)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConverterRegistry
        Add a plain converter to this registry. The convertible sourceType/targetType pair is derived from the Converter's parameterized types.
        定義:
        addConverter インタフェース内 ConverterRegistry

      • addConverter

        public void addConverter(java.lang.Class<?> sourceType,
                         java.lang.Class<?> targetType,
                         Converter<?,?> converter)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConverterRegistry
        Add a plain converter to this registry. The convertible sourceType/targetType pair is specified explicitly. Allows for a Converter to be reused for multiple distinct pairs without having to create a Converter class for each pair.
        定義:
        addConverter インタフェース内 ConverterRegistry

      • addConverter

        public void addConverter(GenericConverter converter)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConverterRegistry
        Add a generic converter to this registry.
        定義:
        addConverter インタフェース内 ConverterRegistry

      • addConverterFactory

        public void addConverterFactory(ConverterFactory<?,?> converterFactory)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConverterRegistry
        Add a ranged converter factory to this registry. The convertible sourceType/rangeType pair is derived from the ConverterFactory's parameterized types.
        定義:
        addConverterFactory インタフェース内 ConverterRegistry

      • removeConvertible

        public void removeConvertible(java.lang.Class<?> sourceType,
                              java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConverterRegistry
        Remove any converters from sourceType to targetType.
        定義:
        removeConvertible インタフェース内 ConverterRegistry
        パラメータ:
        sourceType - the source type
        targetType - the target type

      • canConvert

        public boolean canConvert(java.lang.Class<?> sourceType,
                          java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConversionService
        Return true if objects of sourceType can be converted to the targetType.

        If this method returns true, it means ConversionService.convert(Object, Class) is capable of converting an instance of sourceType to targetType.

        Special note on collections, arrays, and maps types: For conversion between collection, array, and map types, this method will return true even though a convert invocation may still generate a ConversionException if the underlying elements are not convertible. Callers are expected to handle this exceptional case when working with collections and maps.

        定義:
        canConvert インタフェース内 ConversionService
        パラメータ:
        sourceType - the source type to convert from (may be null if source is null)
        targetType - the target type to convert to (required)
        戻り値:
        true if a conversion can be performed, false if not

      • canConvert

        public boolean canConvert(TypeDescriptor sourceType,
                          TypeDescriptor targetType)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConversionService
        Return true if objects of sourceType can be converted to the targetType. The TypeDescriptors provide additional context about the source and target locations where conversion would occur, often object fields or property locations.

        If this method returns true, it means ConversionService.convert(Object, TypeDescriptor, TypeDescriptor) is capable of converting an instance of sourceType to targetType.

        Special note on collections, arrays, and maps types: For conversion between collection, array, and map types, this method will return true even though a convert invocation may still generate a ConversionException if the underlying elements are not convertible. Callers are expected to handle this exceptional case when working with collections and maps.

        定義:
        canConvert インタフェース内 ConversionService
        パラメータ:
        sourceType - context about the source type to convert from (may be null if source is null)
        targetType - context about the target type to convert to (required)
        戻り値:
        true if a conversion can be performed between the source and target types, false if not

      • canBypassConvert

        public boolean canBypassConvert(TypeDescriptor sourceType,
                                TypeDescriptor targetType)
        Return whether conversion between the sourceType and targetType can be bypassed.

        More precisely, this method will return true if objects of sourceType can be converted to the targetType by returning the source object unchanged.

        パラメータ:
        sourceType - context about the source type to convert from (may be null if source is null)
        targetType - context about the target type to convert to (required)
        戻り値:
        true if conversion can be bypassed; false otherwise
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if targetType is null
        導入されたバージョン:
        3.2

      • convert

        public <T> T convert(java.lang.Object source,
                     java.lang.Class<T> targetType)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConversionService
        Convert the given source to the specified targetType.
        定義:
        convert インタフェース内 ConversionService
        パラメータ:
        source - the source object to convert (may be null)
        targetType - the target type to convert to (required)
        戻り値:
        the converted object, an instance of targetType

      • convert

        public java.lang.Object convert(java.lang.Object source,
                                TypeDescriptor sourceType,
                                TypeDescriptor targetType)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ConversionService
        Convert the given source to the specified targetType. The TypeDescriptors provide additional context about the source and target locations where conversion will occur, often object fields or property locations.
        定義:
        convert インタフェース内 ConversionService
        パラメータ:
        source - the source object to convert (may be null)
        sourceType - context about the source type to convert from (may be null if source is null)
        targetType - context about the target type to convert to (required)
        戻り値:
        the converted object, an instance of targetType

      • convert

        public java.lang.Object convert(java.lang.Object source,
                                TypeDescriptor targetType)
        Convenience operation for converting a source object to the specified targetType, where the targetType is a descriptor that provides additional conversion context. Simply delegates to convert(Object, TypeDescriptor, TypeDescriptor) and encapsulates the construction of the sourceType descriptor using TypeDescriptor.forObject(Object).
        パラメータ:
        source - the source object
        targetType - the target type
        戻り値:
        the converted value
        例外:
        ConversionException - if a conversion exception occurred
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if targetType is null, or sourceType is null but source is not null

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        オーバーライド:
        toString クラス内 java.lang.Object
